summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3392 for the improvement of Chicago Street, from 46th Avenue South to Rainier Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42061, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
